group_1.narration: Akira, Kako, Meiyui, and I@formed a [textRed:Magical Girl alliance]...
Together, we tracked down and defeated@the locust Witch...our common enemy.

group_1.textRight: So it's not over yet, I take it?
So that's why you three @are still moving as a group.

group_1.textLeft: ...Locusts lay countless eggs, which@makes their plagues last for years.
It may have been a Familiar@that had evolved into a Witch.
Their magic was so similar that@it took me a while to notice...

group_1.textRight: So you're going to keep tracking it?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I talked to them about it, and...
...In that case, we just gotta keep@at it!
It would not look good for a member of @the Blue Seas Family to give up so easily.
So yes, we will work even more closely.
And since the Witch has so many nests,@we are also gathering more allies.

group_1.textRight: It is your duty as Magical Girls to defeat@Witches, after all.
And you are all carrying out that duty with @real sincerity.
I have no complaints about that...
Even if revenge is what motivates you most...

group_1.textLeft: I admit, that is part of it...[chara:300501:cheek_-1:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json] But...

group_1.narration: Ever since I uncovered that secret...
I swore that I would destroy@every Witch I possibly could.
